          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10507561">
          <div id="boxatt10507561" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12767518">
              <a id="link_12767518" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/amjewishlife" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767518,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767518});">
               American Jewish Life and Culture
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link21020687">
              <a id="link_21020687" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/zionism" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21020687,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21020687});">
               From Zion to Zionism
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link13957270">
              <a id="link_13957270" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/genderjudaism" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13957270,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13957270});">
               Gender and Sexuality in Judaism
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767539">
              <a id="link_12767539" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/jewishnationalism" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767539,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767539});">
               History of Jewish Nationalism
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link24008934">
              <a id="link_24008934" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/jscapstone" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24008934,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24008934});">
               Jewish Studies Capstone
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767564">
              <a id="link_12767564" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/jewishsecular" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767564,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767564});">
               The Jewish Experience in a Secular Age
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22678156">
              <a id="link_22678156" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/jewishthought" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22678156,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22678156});">
               Paths in Jewish Thought
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>

          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10507525">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10507525">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10507525">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10507525">
          <div id="boxatt10507525" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12767475">
              <a id="link_12767475" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767475,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767475}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to research literature in world religions and related studies, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767659">
              <a id="link_12767659" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=jph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767659,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767659}); ">
               Index to Jewish Periodicals
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Comprehensive index to English-language articles from journals devoted to Jewish affairs.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767474">
              <a id="link_12767474" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767474,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767474}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive upwards of 25 scholarly Jewish Studies studies journals, all full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767672">
              <a id="link_12767672" href="http://jnul.huji.ac.il/rambi/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767672,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767672}); ">
               RAMBI (Index of Articles on Jewish Studies)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A selective index of articles in the various fields of Jewish studies and in the study of Eretz Israel.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10507526">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10507526">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10507526">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10507526">
          <div id="boxatt10507526" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12767476">
              <a id="link_12767476" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767476,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767476}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767689">
              <a id="link_12767689" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767689,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767477">
              <a id="link_12767477" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767477,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767477}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database with journal articles in the arts, humanities, and social sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12767694">
              <a id="link_12767694" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12767694,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jewish Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2987833" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Subject Guide
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63914">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" title="View Profile">

             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Contact Info
              </b>
              <br />
              484-664-3602
              <br />

               Send Email
              </a>

              </b>
